headline.main: Foe Attacks Kokoda, New Guinea; Fierce Clash With Allies Reported; JAPANESE ATTACK NEW GUINEA POST

lead_paragraph: AT UNITED NATIONS HEADQUARTERS, Australia, Wednesday, Sept. 2 -- Japanese ground forces fighting their way overland in New Guinea toward the big Allied base at Port Moresby have attacked Allied positions at Kokoda with increased strength and, as a result, ground fighting there has been intensified, General Douglas MacArthur's headquarters announced today.
abstract: ground forces hold in fierce battle
